DOC.brief_title: Study ABT-869 Combination With Tarceva Subjects With Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Subject must histologically cytologically confirm nonhematologic malignancy . Subject must ECOG Score 02 . Adequate organ function . Subject receive targeted VEGF/PDGF therapy ( tyrosine kinase inhibitor ) therapy . Prior Avastin allow . Subject untreated brain meningeal metastasis . History great 10 % weight loss . Has clinically relevant hemoptysis . Subject proteinuria CTC grade > 1 . Must radiation therapy major surgery within 21 day study day 1 . The subject currently exhibit symptomatic persistent , uncontrolled hypertension define diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) > 100 mmHg systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) > 150 mmHg . Subjects may rescreened blood pressure show control without intervention . The subject document leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 50 % .
